title: Sun Valley Gold LLC: Control and Direction Over Common Shares of Belo Sun Mining Corp.
text:
July 28, 2015 17:47 ET Sun Valley Gold LLC: Control and Direction Over Common Shares of Belo Sun Mining Corp. 
SUN VALLEY, IDAHO--(Marketwired - July 28, 2015) - Sun Valley Gold LLC ("Sun Valley") announced today that it has acquired control and direction over an aggregate of 291,000 common shares ("Common Shares") of Belo Sun Mining Corp. ("Belo Sun") on behalf of client accounts, including Sun Valley Gold Master Fund, Ltd. (the "Master Fund"), over which it has discretionary trading authority. The Common Shares were acquired on the open market on July 23/24, 2015 for a purchase price of $0.16 per share. 
Following completion of the acquisition described above, Sun Valley exercises control and direction over an aggregate of 48,456,732 Common Shares for and on behalf of client accounts, representing approximately 13.48% of the issued and outstanding Common Shares. The Master Fund beneficially owns 30,799,854 Common Shares, representing approximately 8.57% of the issued and outstanding Common Shares. 
The securities of Belo Sun were acquired for investment purposes. Sun Valley and the Master Fund may increase or decrease their ownership of securities of Belo Sun depending upon future market conditions.
